original_text: So I went to the angel and asked him to give me the little scroll. He said to me, “Take it and eat it. It will turn your stomach sour, but ‘in your mouth it will be as sweet as honey.’”
korean_text: 내가 천사에게 나아가 작은 두루마리를 달라 한즉 천사가 이르되 갖다 먹어 버리라 네 배에는 쓰나 네 입에는 꿀 같이 달리라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: So I went to the angel
and asked him to give me the little scroll
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 작은 두루마리를 나에게 주라고 그에게 청했습니다

sentences.original_text: It will turn your stomach sour
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 네 배를 쓰리게 만들 것이지만

sentences.original_text: but 'in your mouth it will be as sweet as honey'
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 입 안에서는 꿀처럼 달 것이'
